slides.title: Product Showcase 2026
slides.notes: Welcome to our 2026 product showcase. Today we're unveiling our new collection featuring innovative designs and sustainable materials.

slides.title: Collection Highlights
slides.notes: This collection represents 18 months of research and development, focusing on both style and sustainability.

slides.title: New Product Lines
slides.notes: Let's explore each of our four new product lines in detail.
